list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an object, quality, or event whose presence or occurrence indicates the probable presence or occurrence of something else.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: flowers are often given as a sign of affection
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: hoa thường được đưa ra như một dấu hiệu của tình cảm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a gesture or action used to convey information or instructions.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she gave him the thumbs-up sign
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã cho anh ấy dấu hiệu ngón tay cái

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a notice that is publicly displayed giving information or instructions in a written or symbolic form.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I didn't see the stop sign
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã không nhìn thấy dấu hiệu dừng lại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of the twelve equal sections into which the zodiac is divided, named from the constellations formerly situated in each, and associated with successive periods of the year according to the position of the sun on the ecliptic.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a person born under the sign of Virgo
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một người sinh ra dưới dấu hiệu của Xử Nữ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the positiveness or negativeness of a quantity.
write one's name on (a letter, card, or similar item) to identify oneself as the writer or sender.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the card was signed by the whole class
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thẻ đã được ký bởi cả lớp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: use gestures to convey information or instructions.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she signed to her husband to leave the room
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã ký hợp đồng với chồng rời khỏi phòng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: mark or consecrate with the sign of the cross.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he signed himself with the cross
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã tự ký với thập giá
